name: 4th Disciple
description: '''Selwyn Bougard''', now known as '''El-Divine Amir Bey''' (born May 23, 1974), better known by his stage name '''4th Disciple''', is a [[Disc jockey|DJ]], [[record producer]] and [[audio engineer]] who was one of the founding members of [[Killarmy]] and one of the best-known [[List of Wu-Tang Clan affiliates|Wu-Tang-affiliated producers]]. He is the only member of the Wu Elements to have worked on Wu-Tang Clan's first breakthrough album, as a mixer.
